column5: I'll be going there this weekend.... has anyone fished that area and have any advice??  what kind of fish should I be targeting? any pike?
I've never fished it, this is just the word on the street,  for a few years, some older guys took small walleye from Head Lk and threw them in South..........
Fished it back in the 70's and caught smallies and largemouth bass.  Perch and catfish as well.
this doesnt seem very promising guys since bass season is closed
It's a bass lake.  There are walleye in Canning or Kashagawigamog which are very close to South.
Ive fished the lake...Bass and perch...no walleye. Very flat and featureless.Nothing really to target now.
